title: Official exchange rate (LCU per US$, period average)
name: pa.nus.fcrf
readme: Official exchange rate refers to the exchange rate determined by national authorities or to the rate determined in the legally sanctioned exchange market. It is calculated as an annual average based on monthly averages (local currency units relative to the U.S. dollar).

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Official exchange rate refers to the exchange rate determined by national authorities or to the rate determined in the legally sanctioned exchange market. It is calculated as an annual average based on monthly averages (local currency units relative to the U.S. dollar).
